book.synopsis: An experienced author offers a delightful and exuberant memoir of his youth, recounting how his mother lived in a longterm gay relationship with groundbreaking journalist Janet Flanner, capturing the unconventionality and love that shaped his life.
book.title_long: Janet, My Mother, and Me: A Memoir of Growing Up with Janet Flanner and Natalia Danesi Murray
book.dimensions: Height: 9.25 Inches, Length: 6 Inches, Weight: 1 Pounds, Width: 1.25 Inches
